Title: The AI Model Wars Just Heated WAY Up
Description:
Today’s AI Daily Brief dives into the escalating model wars between OpenAI, Google, and Apple. OpenAI seems to have leaked GPT-5 and their open weights model temporarily, plus the surprise launch of Google’s Gemini 2.5 Deep Think, and why Apple is scrambling to catch up—with M&A as its only viable AI strategy. We also explore new AI interface innovations from Manus and Perplexity, plus the implications of China’s probe into Nvidia’s H20 chips.
